incidents.title: Billing System Maintenance
incidents.content:
On 27.07.2021 we will perform maintenance work on our billing system from 12pm to 2pm (CEST). During this time, the Customer Center will be completely or partially unavailable.

2021-07-27T14:00:00.000Z
Update

The maintenance work is delayed by about 60min. Sorry for the inconvenience

incidents.title: Maintenance on tshost.myvirtualserver.com
incidents.content:
The maintenance work will take place on Tuesday the 27.07.2021 at 10 A.M. (CEST) and will probably last 20 minutes, during this time the whole teamspeak host will be unavailable. This maintenance work is necessary to further improve the quality of our products.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

2021-07-27T08:20:39.662Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed.

incidents.title: Maintenance on web01.vnetso.com
incidents.content:
The maintenance work will take place on Saturday the 24.07.2021 at 11 P.M. (CEST) and will probably last 120 minutes, during this time the whole webspace including (depending on your configuration) website and mail will be unavailable. This maintenance work is necessary to further improve the quality of our products.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

2021-07-24T23:35:00.000Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed.

incidents.title: Billing system and Teamspeak Host malfunction
incidents.description:
Currently our billing system and the Teamspeak host are not available due to a technical error. 
Our specialists are already working on a solution.
incidents.content:
Currently our billing system and the Teamspeak host are not available due to a technical error. Our specialists are already working on a solution.

2021-06-10T10:39:23.000Z
Resolved

Due to a software error on a node, the billing system, web01 and the Teamspeak host were not accessible. The problem has been fixed since 10:40 UTC. We apologize for the inconvenience.

incidents.title: Some VPS offline
incidents.description: We are receiving reports of some VPS being offline and are currently investigating the issue.
incidents.content:
We are receiving reports of some VPS being offline and are currently investigating the issue.

2021-05-24T17:50:02.000Z
Resolved

Due to a distributed attack some VPS experienced degraded network stability. The network is stable again since 17:10 UTC. We apologise for the inconvenience.

incidents.title: Billing System Maintenance
incidents.content:
We are performing maintenance on our billing system.

2021-05-03T08:48:00.000Z
Resolved

Maintenance is now complete..
